original_text: God said, ‘Do this in front of them. Then they will believe you. They will believe that I, the Lord God, have appeared to you. I am the God that their ancestors worshipped. I am the God of Abraham, the God of Isaac and the God of Jacob.’
korean_text: 이는 그들에게 그들의 조상의 하나님 곧 아브라함의 하나님, 이삭의 하나님, 야곱의 하나님 여호와가 네게 나타난 줄을 믿게 하려 함이라 하시고

sentences.original_text: God said, 'Do this in front of them.
They will believe that I, the Lord God, have appeared to you.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 주 하나님이 너에게 나타났음을 믿을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: I am the God that their ancestors worshipped.
I am the God of Abraham,
